title: Washington and Photo on Education - context

content.question: The Fisk Jubilee Singers are best understood within which of the following contexts?

choices.label: The expansion of the Black press and its role in protesting racial inequality
The impact of the African Methodist Episcopal Church on African American communities
The increase in educational opportunities for African Americans in the United States
The economic success of African American entrepreneurs who supported community initiatives

content.answer: The increase in educational opportunities for African Americans in the United States

topic.text: 3.10: HBCUs, Black Greek Letter Organizations, and Black Education

skill.text: 1.B: Identify and explain the context of a specific event, development, or process.
